Package pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1

Class CommandFactory

java.lang.Object
pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1.CommandFactory
public class CommandFactory extends Object
A factory class responsible for creating different Command objects based on the command type.

The class provides a method to instantiate specific command classes (such as PricesCommand, ViewCommand, etc.) according to the given string command type.

  • Constructor Details

    • CommandFactory

      public CommandFactory(ExcelHandler eh, MyMap<Integer,Room> r)
      Constructs a new CommandFactory with the provided ExcelHandler and a map of rooms.
      Parameters:
      eh - an instance of ExcelHandler to handle file operations
      r - a map containing room numbers as keys and Room objects as values

  • Method Details

    • getCommand

      public Command getCommand(String commandType)
      Returns an appropriate Command object based on the provided command type.

      This method matches the given command type to the corresponding command class. If the command type is invalid, it returns null.

      Parameters:
      commandType - the type of the command (e.g., "prices", "view", "checkin")
      Returns:
      a Command object corresponding to the provided command type or null if no match is found
